title: F/S ORIGINAL TINTYPE ca. 1870 BASEBALL PLAYER IN FULL UNIFORM-moving to EBAY
author: WillowGrove

posts.post_title: F/S ORIGINAL TINTYPE ca. 1870 BASEBALL PLAYER IN FULL UNIFORM-moving to EBAY
posts.post_content:
I think I'm ready to let this go to another collector.  2 1/2 x just under 4 inches.  Original guaranteed. This one has a lot going for it - strong image and you get a nice full uniform and a nice ring bat.   I love the hat the most.

$550ppd.  Please email me at [url]peterfish56@gmail.com[/url] if interested.   thanks 

peter
